answers.answer: Why are you being induced ? Im jealous . I'm 37 weeks . I wanna be induced huh !
Lol I have no ideaaaaa!! They told me when I have an appointment with my midwife she will explain why.. I wouldn't mind having the baby early either lol I'm exhausted!
Yep, during mg first pregnancy, my ob wanted to delivery 3weeks earlier than my due date coz my baby was big, had a 3.49kg baby boy tried labor but later delivered by CS, coz he wont fit.
It's because that's a low weight for the baby to have at 35 weeks the baby might have stopped receiving nutrients and such which causes him not to gain any weight
Um thats not small for a baby at 35 weeks ... 3.5kg is roughly 7 lbs 11 oz.... thats actually big for being 35 weeks
That really big at 35 weeks. Im 35 weeks also I wonder how much my baby weighs now she was 4.4 at 31 weeks
Yeah my baby is pretty big for 35 weeks. I think that's probably why they want to induce me earlier.Just 3 weeks ago, she weighed 2.2, now she's 3.5.
Wow... Congrats. Big healthy baby. Do you have gestational diabetes or I'd she just growing extremely fast?
Sheesh big healthy baby lol. I'm 37 wks and have a 5lb 11oz baby. Good luck though :)
Haha thanks girls! No no diabetes she's just growing really fast lol.GOODLUCK to you too ladies xoxox
I swear i think my baby weighs about the same lol but that just cause i think I'm huge lol I'm 35 weeks too i want to be induced so bad but i won't rush it

question: 35 weeks today, baby weighing 3.5kgs...Doctors said I might get induced earlier than my due date. Anyone been through this?
title: 35 weeks
